Uses of OrderDish in pizzaProgram.utils
 

Methods in pizzaProgram.utils with parameters of type OrderDish
static String PriceCalculators.getPriceForOrderDish(OrderDish od)
          Generates a priceString on the form "0,00" containing the VAT for the provided ordered dish (IE a price in norwegian øre of 12345 would return a string which contains "123,45".
private static int PriceCalculators.getValueForOrderDish(OrderDish od)
          Generates the value of the ordered dish, in norwegian øre (1/100 NOK), based on the sum of the ordered dish and its extras.
